Data: Tendulkar to Symonds, 1 run Symonds drives towards long-on for another single
Tendulkar to Hogg, 1 run tossed up into the left-hander from round the wicket, Tendulkar is bowling leg breaks, defended on the front foot towards point
Tendulkar to Symonds, no run bowled flatter through the air on middle and off stump, Symonds drives off the back foot towards cover
Tendulkar to Symonds, no run defended back to the bowler on the front foot, Tendulkar is mixing them up
Tendulkar to Symonds, no run Symonds leans forward and blocks
Tendulkar to Symonds, no run there's a bit of turn away from the right-hander but Symonds leans forward and opens the face to play the ball towards point

Kumble to Hogg, OUT caught! Kumble looks up at the sky in relief, Hogg tries to force the ball through the off side off the back foot, the ball bounces a bit more and takes the outside edge which flies towards first slip where Dravid remains alert des
Kumble to Lee, no run loud appeal for lbw but Lee had got a long stride forward and was hit in line of off stump, it was the stride that went in the batsman's favour
Kumble to Lee, no run defended off the back foot towards short leg
Kumble to Lee, no run defended off the front foot towards the bowler
Kumble to Lee, 2 runs Lee drives loosely away from his body and gets an outside edge that runs towards third man
Kumble to Lee, no run Lee moves forward and defends back to the bowler

Tendulkar to Symonds, 1 run driven off the front foot towards long-off
Tendulkar to Lee, no run that was the quicker and straighter one from Tendulkar outside off stump, defended on the off side
Tendulkar to Lee, no run Lee moves back, gets behind the line and blocks
Tendulkar to Lee, no run Lee takes a long stride forward and defends
Tendulkar to Lee, no run a bit wider outside off stump, Lee moves towards the ball and tries to cut off the back foot but gets beaten
Kumble to Symonds, no run defended on the off side
Kumble to Symonds, FOUR runs Symonds picks Kumble from outside off stump and whacks him to the deep midwicket boundary

Kumble to Symonds, no run huge appeal for leg before, Symonds moved across his stumps, tried to sweep and missed, that hit him in front of middle and it was low on the pad as well, very close call, Symonds had got a long stride in and the ball may hav
Kumble to Symonds, no run
Kumble to Symonds, 1 run driven towards long off for a single
Kumble to Lee, no run Lee lunged forward in defence but got beaten
Tendulkar to Symonds, 2 runs full toss on leg stump, Symonds flicks it off his pads for a single
Tendulkar to Symonds, no run defended off the front foot towards cover
Tendulkar to Symonds, no run Tendulkar is pitching it outside the right-hander's leg stump from round the wicket, Symonds comes down the track an defends
Tendulkar to Symonds, no run defended on the front foot back down the pitch
Tendulkar to Symonds, no run Symonds begins to come forward and Tendulkar drops it short on leg stump, he moves back and pulls to short fine leg
Tendulkar to Symonds, no run what a ball that is, it drifted across Symonds, pitched on leg, and spun across him, completely beating the outside edge of the front-foot defence
Kumble to Lee, no run defended off the front foot back to the bowler
Kumble to Lee, no run Lee gets forward and defends towards short leg
Kumble to Lee, no run bowled full and fast on off stump, Lee strides forward and defends
Kumble to Lee, no run bowled full on middle stump, Lee defends off the front foot once again

Kumble to Symonds, 1 run defended off the front foot towards square leg
Tendulkar to Symonds, 1 run another full toss on leg stump, Symonds leans forward and hits it to deep midwicket
Tendulkar to Lee, no run Lee leans on to the front foot and drives firmly towards Tendulkar who half-stops the ball
Tendulkar to Lee, FOUR runs this time Lee uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball and he drives superbly past Tendulkar, the ball races to the long-off boundary
Tendulkar to Lee, no run blocked on the front foot towards the bowler
Tendulkar to Lee, no run defended on the front foot towards the off side

Kumble to Symonds, no run Symonds tries to sweep but doesn't make contact
Kumble to Symonds, 1 run Symonds gets down on one knee and sweeps to deep square leg
Kumble to Lee, no run quicker ball, defended on the back foot

Kumble to Lee, 2 runs Lee moves forward and flicks the ball off his pads towards fine leg
Tendulkar to Symonds, no run bowled flat from round the wicket, pitching outside leg stump, Symonds leans forward and defends

Tendulkar to Lee, no run bowled flat and quick on middle stump, Lee moves back and defends

Tendulkar to Lee, no run now he latches upon a full toss outside off stump but can't place it past mid-off
Tendulkar to Lee, no run Lee tries to cut off the back foot but the bounce is a bit high and the ball beats the bat
Kumble to Symonds, FOUR runs Symonds uses his feet to get o the pitch of the ball and hits Kumble into the gap at deep midwicket, he's played that short-arm jab effectively against Kumble
Kumble to Symonds, 1 run played towards fine leg for a single

Kumble to Lee, no run defended on the front foot towards the leg side
Kumble to Lee, no run defended on the front foot towards the off side
Kumble to Lee, no run bowled quicker and flatter on off and middle stump, Lee gets behind the line and blocks

Singh to Symonds, no run the second new ball swings right away, RP angles it across Symonds and gets it to swing back into the right-hander, Symonds gets an inside edge on to the pad
Singh to Symonds, no run good length delivery on off stump, Symonds moves forward and defends

Singh to Symonds, FOUR runs that's outstanding, the length wasn't that bad but the line was a bit wide, Symonds moved forward and drove through the line on the up and the ball raced past mid-off for four
Singh to Symonds, FOUR runs and again, this time the length is fuller outside off stump and Symonds drives between cover and mid-off for four more
Singh to Symonds, no run defended off the back foot towards the bowler
Sharma to Lee, FOUR runs a full delivery swings into Lee who leans forward and tries to drive, the thick outside edge runs past backward point for yet another boundary, Australia bring up 350

Sharma to Lee, 1 run fuller length on off and middle stump, Lee pushes the ball towards wide mid-on
Sharma to Symonds, no run Symonds tries to cut a good length ball but gets a bottom edge into the ground to Dhoni
Sharma to Symonds, no run short and wide outside the off stump, Symonds tries to cut but gets beaten, he didn't move his feet much
Sharma to Symonds, no run played with an open face off the back foot towards backward point
Singh to Lee, no run full ball swings down leg side, Lee tries to flick but he's far away from the ball
Singh to Lee, no run short of a length ball outside off stump, Lee moves back and cuts towards point
Singh to Lee, no run banged in short outside off stump, Lee sways out of the way
Singh to Lee, no run RP angles a good length delivery sharply into the right-hander from round the wicket, Lee gets hit high on the front pad
Singh to Lee, 1 leg bye he strays on to leg stump this time, Lee leans across and flicks towards square leg

Singh to Symonds, FOUR runs short ball and Symonds meets it with a powerful pull off the front foot, it should have only been a single but a terrible bit of fielding concedes four, Yuvraj - India's best fielder - over-ran the ball on the midwicket bou
Sharma to Lee, no run Lee tries to cut off the back foot but gets beaten
Sharma to Lee, no run Lee moves back and pushes a good length ball from Ishant towards Yuvraj at point, mocking cheers around the SCG as Yuvraj fields that one
Sharma to Lee, no run Lee tries to force the ball off the back foot but gets an inside edge past his stumps
Sharma to Lee, no run driven off the back foot towards Yuvraj at point who picks up and throws at the non-striker's end, Symonds was never in any danger
Sharma to Lee, no run Ishant is getting the new ball to seam back into the right-hander after pitching outside off stump, Lee defends off the back foot
Sharma to Lee, 1 run Lee leans forward and drives away from hi body at a full ball outside off, the inside edge runs past his stumps towards fine leg
Singh to Lee, no run driven off the front foot towards cover

Singh to Lee, FOUR runs full ball angling into middle stump, Lee moves back quickly and flicks off his pads through midwicket, he's used the pace of the ball and timed it well enough to reach the boundary
Singh to Lee, no run short of a length outside the off stump, Lee tries to cut but the movement into him forces another bottom edge
Singh to Lee, no run wide outside the off stump this time, Lee chases it with the cut shot but can't make contact
Singh to Lee, no run fuller ball on middle and leg stump, Lee defends towards the leg side
Singh to Lee, FOUR runs that's too full on leg stump, Lee moves forward and flicks it off his pads through midwicket, Yuvraj dives despairing on the boundary but parries the ball over the line
Sharma to Symonds, no run Symonds tries to cut from outside off stump but misses
Sharma to Symonds, no run defended off the front foot towards the off side
Sharma to Symonds, no run Ishant gets the ball to jag back sharply from outside off stump and cuts Symonds in half
Sharma to Symonds, no run short and wide outside off stump, Symonds reaches out to cut but bottom edges it towards Tendulkar at first slip

Sharma to Lee, no run Lee stands on the back foot and cuts hard towards gully
Ganguly to Symonds, 1 run cut off the back foot towards deep point for a single
Ganguly to Lee, no run Lee moves back to a good length ball and mis-times the cut towards point
Ganguly to Lee, no run good length delivery around the off stump, Lee leans forward and defends

Ganguly to Lee, 3 runs Lee moves across his stumps to a full ball and flicks it towards deep square leg, Dravid runs across on the boundary to field and the batsmen run three
Harbhajan to Lee, 1 run Lee moves forward to a tossed up delivery and drives past the bowler for a single

Harbhajan to Lee, no run defended off the front foot towards the bowler

Harbhajan to Lee, no run Harbhajan beats the outside edge of Lee's back foot defence with the doosra, the ball beats Dhoni as well but Dravid is quick to react and dives to prevent the ball from hitting the helmet placed behind the keeper, he saved fi
Harbhajan to Lee, no run defended on the front foot

Ganguly to Lee, no run defended on the back foot towards point

Another plug: as if following us in the office wasn't enough, now you can get our ball-by-ball commentary on your mobile...

Symonds finishes unbeaten on 162 and takes the applause from the crowd. Now, a nice moment, Ishant goes up and shakes his hand to indicate no hard feelings. So, Australia, what a recovery from 6 for 134 to 463, and they have Symonds, Hogg and Lee to thank in
So that's a big breakthrough and Australia rightly celebrate. In comes Yuvraj Singh

Clarke to Tendulkar, no run on the front foot, pushes them into the covers

Hogg to Tendulkar, 1 run good rip up there, pushed out to mid-on
Hogg to Yuvraj, no run on leg, squeezed out to mid-on, where there was one bounce
Hogg to Yuvraj, no run dragged down, kept low, Yuvraj is all a-tangle as he tries to pull it, he misses and it raps him on the leg, but it was going down so the appeal isn't upheld
Clarke to Tendulkar, no run on middle, bouncing up, Tendulkar shapes to defend back down
Clarke to Tendulkar, no run a leading edge squirts past the man short in on off, a half-chance, as he closed the face
Clarke to Tendulkar, no run waited and driven out to cover
Clarke to Tendulkar, no run turned behind him but they turn down thoughts of a run
Clarke to Tendulkar, FOUR runs a muscular cut off the back foot that flies up again, but wide of the man in gully who now sets off in pursuit
Clarke to Tendulkar, 1 run on middle, a push towards mid-off and they squeeze out the single, cheekily too
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run full delivery, defended on the front foot
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run up there again, keeping him quiet, defended again
Hogg to Tendulkar, 1 run extra flight, Tendulkar playing in front of midwicket
Hogg to Yuvraj, no run on off, turning away from him, he shoulders arms
Hogg to Yuvraj, no run superb delivery, right through past the outside edge, Yuvraj playing down the wrong line and the ball zipping away, just
Hogg to Yuvraj, no run right over it and defends
Lee to Tendulkar, no run up there on off, slightly short, defended down on the back foot
Lee to Tendulkar, no run oh, very close to off stump, Tendulkar shoulders arms as it nips just above the bail
Lee to Tendulkar, 1 run straighter, pushed to mid-on and the crowd go wild with screams as Tendulkar brings up his fifty from 96 balls, with three fours and a six
Lee to Yuvraj, FOUR runs played very well off the legs now in front of middle, excellent timing
Lee to Yuvraj, no run pushed down leg, a bouncer, Yuvraj arcing his back to avoid being hit
Lee to Yuvraj, no run turned off the legs, Yuvraj sets off but he's sent back - a good job, too, as the return was a quick one
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 wide starts with a very wide, pushed way across the right hander
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run right up there and defended on the front foot
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run good line and length, zipping past the right hander, who chooses early to leave, shouldering arms
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 run movement back in to the right hander from outside off, tucked off the hips into midwicket
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run just on off, rising, making him play a defence down on the back foot
Johnson to Yuvraj, FOUR runs regulation half-volley which Yuvraj dispatches well with a drive through mid-off. Good timing
Johnson to Yuvraj, 1 run on to the back foot, pressed down into the covers
Lee to Yuvraj, no run straight bouncer which Yuvraj backs into, quite literally
Lee to Yuvraj, no run pushed across the left hander who defends down now
Lee to Yuvraj, no run more of the same, defended on the back foot
Lee to Yuvraj, no run short on off, sat up a touch, and brisked down off the hips to midwicket
Lee to Dhoni, no run short ball, pushed back forward, Lee picks it up and shies back at the striker's stumps
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run nipped off the seam, left alone on the way through
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run pushed across the right hander, who shoulders arms
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run outside off, crouched low, and left through
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 run nudged well off the hips
Johnson to Dhoni, no run just outside off, Dhoni fends into the off side on the front foot
Johnson to Dhoni, no run pushed across the right hander, who leaves it easily enough
Lee to Tendulkar, no run Lee begins the second session with a sharp bouncer that's supremely directed, Tendulkar quickly ducks under it, if he wasn't alert after the break, he should be now
Lee to Tendulkar, no run Lee bowls another bouncer but this time it's down leg side, Tendulkar moves across his stumps and gets out of the line of the ball
Lee to Tendulkar, 1 run fuller length on middle stump, Tendulkar pushes the ball towards midwicket and calls for the single
Lee to Dhoni, no run short of a length delivery but the line is too wide outside off for Dhoni to play at it
Lee to Dhoni, no run full delivery angling into off stump, Dhoni leans forward and mis-times the drive towards mid-off
Lee to Dhoni, no run short of a length delivery on off stump, Dhoni moves deep in his crease and defends, taking his bottom hand off the bat handle, that ball got big on him
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run full delivery angling wide across the right-hander, Tendulkar lets it go through to Gilchrist

Johnson to Tendulkar, FOUR runs this time Tendulkar reaches out for the wide half-volley outside off and drives superbly through cover, Hogg runs about 15 yards on the cover boundary but the ball beats him
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run the length isn't full this time but the line is still outside off stump, Tendulkar tries to cut but gets beaten
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run extremely wide outside off stump, that was bordering on a Test-match wide
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run closer to off stump this time but Tendulkar chooses to let it go because Johnson isn't getting the ball to swing back into the right-hander
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run defended off the back foot towards the bowler
Lee to Dhoni, no run Dhoni moves back and across to a good length ball around off stump and punches towards cover
Lee to Dhoni, no run Dhoni's playing the cover drive as he moves on to the front foot, he's not fully on the front foot as he's playing the shot
Lee to Dhoni, no run Lee bangs in the short ball on off stump, Dhoni sways out of the way
Lee to Dhoni, 2 runs Lee gives Dhoni a full toss to get off the mark, Dhoni accepts and flicks towards deep midwicket
Lee to Dhoni, no run once again he plays the cover drive half-way through his movement on to the front foot, he doesn't find the gap
Lee to Dhoni, (no ball) Dhoni lets a good length ball go outside his off stump, one more to go in the over for Lee had over-stepped

Lee to Dhoni, OUT and he's edged the extra ball! Lee pitches the ball on a good length outside off stump, Dhoni hardly moves his feet as he pushes at the ball, the thick edge flies through to Gilchrist who takes it comfortably to register his 400th di
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 wide wide outside off stump, this time the umpire calls it
Johnson to Tendulkar, FOUR runs edged but safe, Tendulkar played away from his body at a short of a length ball and edged it just out of the reach of Hussey's full length dive to his left at gully
Johnson to Tendulkar, 2 runs played off the pads through midwicket for two more
Johnson to Tendulkar, 2 runs Tendulkar waits on the back foot and drives Johnson through point for two more, he now has 2000 runs against Australia
Johnson to Tendulkar, 2 runs Tendulkar moves back to a shorter ball and whips if from his body through square leg for yet another two
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 run short and wide outside off stump, Tendulkar slashes it through point for the single
Johnson to Kumble, no run fuller length outside the off stump, Kumble gets drawn into chasing it and the ball beats the outside edge
Lee to Tendulkar, 1 run full ball on off stump, Tendulkar moves forward and drives towards mid-off for a single
Lee to Kumble, no run good length ball on off stump, Kumble moves right back and defends towards cover, Tendulkar sets off for the single but stops when he realises there isn't one
Lee to Kumble, no run Kumble goes back and across to a good length ball and defends towards the off side, he got nicely behind the line of that one
Lee to Kumble, 2 runs Kumble once again moves back and flicks the ball off his pads between midwicket and mid-on

Lee to Kumble, OUT Gilchrist takes another one! Kumble moves back and wafts at one that he could have let go past the off stump, he gets a healthy edge and Gilchrist takes no 401, he's having a much better day today
Lee to Harbhajan, 2 runs he slices the ball dangerously in the air but in the gap between cover and point
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 run full ball on middle and leg stump, Tendulkar drives wide of the fielder at mid-on, who is rather deep, and takes the single
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run what is Harbhajan thinking? He just stood rooted to the crease and flayed at one that angled away from him, the ball beats the outside edge

Johnson to Harbhajan, 1 run he throws his bat at another wide one outside off and connects this time, Symonds fields at mid-off but the ball rebounds off his body, Symonds looks back to see if they are taking the second, Harbhajan wants it but Tendulk

Johnson to Tendulkar, no run excellent ball, pitching around off stump and moving away from the right-hander, Tendulkar had to play at that one and the ball beat the outside edge of his front-foot defence
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 run played towards square leg for a single
Johnson to Harbhajan, FOUR runs Harbhajan slashes and slashes very hard, the top edge flies high over the slip cordon for a boundary
Lee to Tendulkar, no run Tendulkar strides forward to a good length ball and defends solidly towards cover
Lee to Tendulkar, no run excellent short ball outside off stump, Tendulkar was equal to he, he watched it all the way and swayed out of the line
Lee to Tendulkar, 1 run Tendulkar moves across and flicks an incoming ball towards deep square leg for one

Lee to Harbhajan, FOUR runs good length ball and Harbhajan meets it with a straight bat and chips it over the bowler's head, he checked his shot but timed it well enough to beat mid-off and collect four
Lee to Harbhajan, 1 run Lee replies with the bouncer and Harbhajan swats it through midwicket
Lee to Tendulkar, FOUR runs Tendulkar cuts the lead down below 100 by slashing a short ball from Lee over slips and down to third man, that was intentionally upper cut
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run wide outside off and this time Harbhajan lets it go
Johnson to Harbhajan, 2 runs he aims to hit over the long on but mis-times it and just about manages to clear Stuart Clark at mid-on, he's riding his luck here is Harbhajan
Johnson to Harbhajan, 1 run a good length ball stops on Harbhajan who reaches out for it and checks his shot, it's a bit uppish again but safely in the gap at cover
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run Tendulkar watchfully lets a good length ball pass him outside of stump
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run fuller length outside off, Tendulkar shoulders arms once again
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run Tendulkar drives a full ball firmly towards mid-on who is much closer to save the single off the last ball of the over
Lee to Harbhajan, no run pushed off the back foot towards cover
Lee to Harbhajan, 1 run Lee pitches it short of a length and angles the ball into Harbhajan who tucks it towards square leg
Lee to Tendulkar, 1 run full delivery on middle stump, Tendulkar moves forward and flicks to deep midwicket for one more

Lee to Harbhajan, FOUR runs what a shot from Harbhajan, he moves back and across and pulls Lee confidently in front of midwicket for four, he had his front leg in the air as he played that, shades of the Caribbean
Lee to Harbhajan, no run defended uppishly towards the fielder at gully
Lee to Harbhajan, no run Harbhajan moves back and across and defends the last ball towards point
Johnson to Tendulkar, FOUR runs short and wide outside off stump, Tendulkar reaches out for it and cuts in the air but between the slip cordon and point for four
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 run pushed off the back foot towards mid-off for one more
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run full ball on off stump, Harbhajan strides forward and defends towards the bowler
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run left alone outside off stump, he began to play at it but pulled out of the shot
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run wide outside the off stump and Harbhajan lets it go again
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run this time Johnson pitches around off stump and takes it away from Harbhajan who moves back and across to defend, the ball whizzes past the outside edge
Lee to Tendulkar, no run Lee was looking for the yorker but didn't quite find the blockhole, Tendulkar digs it out on the off side
Lee to Tendulkar, 1 run the slower ball at 125 kph, Tendulkar comes forward and pushes the ball towards long-off for a single, the Australians want Harbhajan on strike
Lee to Harbhajan, no run Harbhajan moves back and defends towards midwicket
Lee to Harbhajan, no run short ball outside off stump, Harbhajan stands tall on the back foot and cuts hard towards Hogg at point
Lee to Harbhajan, 1 run Lee angles the ball into Harbhjan's middle and leg stump from over the wicket, Harbhajan moves across and flicks through square leg
Lee to Tendulkar, no run Tendulkar drives wonderfully off the back foot but can't find the gap at point

Johnson to Harbhajan, 2 runs short of a length ball on off stump, Harbhajan moves back and pushes it into the yawning gap at midwicket, Clark is too slow to run across from mid-on to prevent the second
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run played off the back foot towards backward point
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run Harbhajan gets squared up by a short of a length ball that angles across him and the leading edge goes towards point
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run sharp bouncer from Johnson, Harbhajan tried to pull that but it got too big on him
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run good length ball outside the off stump, defended off the back foot towards cover
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run Harbhajan tries to hammer a full ball through cover but mis-times it towards the bowler
Clark to Tendulkar, no run good length ball on off stump, Tendulkar gets behind the line on the back foot and defends
Clark to Tendulkar, no run pitches on a good length outside off and moves away from Tendulkar who lets it go
Clark to Tendulkar, 1 wide banged in short, it's a bit too short to be effective and Tendulkar ducks under it easily
Clark to Tendulkar, 1 run nudged off the pads towards midwicket, Tendulkar initially called for two but settled for one
Clark to Harbhajan, 2 runs pushed off the back foot wide off Symonds at mid-on for two this time, Symonds isn't at his fleetest best
Clark to Harbhajan, no run defended towards cover on the back foot
Clark to Harbhajan, FOUR runs Harbhajan moves towards the off side and hooks Clark to the fine-leg boundary, more of a guide that a ferocious hook but just as effective
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run Tendulkar reaches out for one outside off and gets beaten
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run he lets this one go outside off stump
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run another one wide outside off stump, left alone once again
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 run this time he reaches out for a very wide ball and hits it past point for a single
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run Harbhajan should enter a lottery today, he played a nothing shot, a sort of chip towards the off side and it fell safely in the direction of mid-off
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run he lets the last one go past his off stump
Clark to Tendulkar, 1 run Tendulkar leans forward to a full and straight ball and drives it right past the bowler, he calls for two but Harbhajan wasn't quick enough
Clark to Harbhajan, no run banged in short outside off stump, Harbhajan decides not to hook and lets it go instead

Clark to Harbhajan, 1 run dropped, Gilchrist lets another one go, Harbhajan tried to pull another short ball, the ball lobbed in the air towards Gilchrist who pedaled backwards and got both gloves to it, he still couldn't hold on
Clark to Tendulkar, no run defended off the back foot towards cover
Clark to Tendulkar, no run Tendulkar leans forward and defends towards cover
Clark to Tendulkar, no run Tendulkar cuts off the back foot but can't find the gap at point
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run Harbhajan moves back to a fuller ball around off stump and punches firmly towards mid-off
Johnson to Harbhajan, 1 run slower ball on middle stump, Harbhajan spotted it and played it wide of the fielder at mid-on for a single
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 run Tendulakr jumps on to the back foot and plays the ball towards point for a single to bring up an invaluable 50-run stand for India
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run short of a length delivery angles across the right-hander, Harbhajan lets it go
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run full ball outside the off stump, Harbhajan digs it out on the off side
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run wide outside the off stump, a pointless delivery, Harbhajan doesn't play at it
Clark to Tendulkar, 1 run Tendulkar moves forward to a good length ball angling into off and middle and flicks towards midwicket
Clark to Harbhajan, no run defended solidly off the back foot towards the off side
Clark to Harbhajan, no run Clark bowls it full on off stump, Harbhajan chooses to go on to the back foot and defends towards the off side
Clark to Harbhajan, 1 run it's full again but Clark drifts on to middle and leg this time, Harbhajan flicks off his pads towards deep square leg

Clark to Tendulkar, FOUR runs that's supreme from Tendulkar, he had just a little room outside off to work with and he split the gap between cover point and backward point with the back-foot square drive, he moves into the 90s and takes India past 40
Clark to Tendulkar, no run defended off the back foot towards the off side
Hogg to Harbhajan, no run defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Hogg to Harbhajan, 1 run pitches on middle and spins in towards Harbhajan who uses the angle to nudge the ball towards square leg
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run strides forward and defends towards the off side
Hogg to Tendulkar, 1 run tossed up outside the off stump, Tendulkar leans forward and uses the angle into him to work the ball through midwicket
Hogg to Harbhajan, no run bowled full into the blockhole on middle and off stump, Harbhajan digs it out towards point
Hogg to Harbhajan, no run defended confidently on the front foot
Clark to Tendulkar, 1 run full ball driven straight down the ground to Lee at long-on
Clark to Harbhajan, no run Clark asks Harbhajan if he wants to hook another bouncer, Harbhajan declines and ducks instead
Clark to Harbhajan, 1 run and this time Harbhajan obliges the short ball by pulling it down to long leg, he's just used the bowler's pace and helped the ball along
Clark to Tendulkar, 1 run Tendulkar moves across his stumps and flicks through square leg for a single, he's not looked nervous at all so far

Clark to Harbhajan, 2 runs Harbhajan defends with a straight bat but Clark gets the ball to seam away from him after pitching on a good length, the outside edge runs past point and the batsmen sprint the second
Clark to Harbhajan, no run defended watchfully off the back foot
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run defended off the front foot
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run tossed up on leg stump, Tendulkar nudges it behind square off the front foot
Hogg to Tendulkar, 2 runs Tendulkar moves back to a flatter ball and flicks through midwicket, he sees that the fielder is Clark and calls for the second run
Hogg to Tendulkar, 1 run driven confidently off the front foot to deep cover, Symonds is the fielder this time so Tendulkar settles for one
Hogg to Harbhajan, no run tossed up on middle stump, Harbhajan misses the drive and gets hit on the front pad, that would have spun past leg
Hogg to Harbhajan, no run he didn't pick the wrong one and was beaten outside off stump
Clark to Tendulkar, no run defended watchfully off the back foot towards cover
Clark to Tendulkar, no run short ball outside off stump, Tendulkar cuts but can't get it past Hogg at point, the SCG is clapping in anticipation

Clark to Tendulkar, 2 runs short, wide outside off stump, Tendulkar drives off the back foot through cover and knows that he's got there, there are no wild celebrations at first, then he takes off his helmet, raises his arms, acknowledges the cheers
Clark to Tendulkar, no run defended solidly off the front foot
Clark to Tendulkar, no run flicked off the front foot towards midwicket
Clark to Tendulkar, no run driven uppishly towards mid-off
Hogg to Harbhajan, no run Harbhajan doesn't quite know which way Hogg is turning, the ball spins into him so he tries to flick it past square leg
Hogg to Harbhajan, no run defended off the front foot towards the bowler
Hogg to Harbhajan, no run defended watchfully off the front foot
Hogg to Harbhajan, no run Harbhajan goes on to the back foot and tries to pull, he doesn't make contact
Hogg to Harbhajan, 2 runs Harbhajan throws his bat at one outside off stump and gets an outside edge towards third man
Hogg to Harbhajan, no run Harbhajan takes a step forward and hammers the ball down the ground, mid-on is a little deep and therefore can cut it off
Clarke to Tendulkar, no run tossed up into the right-hander from round the wicket, Tendulkar leans forward and blocks
Clarke to Tendulkar, no run defended on the front foot once again
Clarke to Tendulkar, no run Clarke fires the ball down leg side, Tendulkar moves towards the off and lets it go
Clarke to Tendulkar, no run tossed up wide outside off stump, Tendulkar reaches out to drive but gets beaten, Gilchrist also fails to collect cleanly
Clarke to Tendulkar, 1 run played off the pads through midwicket
Clarke to Harbhajan, 2 runs Harbhajan moves forward to a full ball and drives fluently towards cover, Hussey dives but can't cut it off, Johnson fields on the boundary
Hogg to Tendulkar, FOUR runs full toss and Tendulkar picks his gap to perfection, he moved forward and drove the ball wide of the fielder at mid-on for four
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run Tendulkar leans forward to a tossed up delivery and defends
Hogg to Tendulkar, 1 run pulled to the fielder on the deep backward square leg boundary
Hogg to Harbhajan, no run bowled flatter outside the off stump, Harbhajan defends watchfully on the front foot
Hogg to Harbhajan, no run pushed off the front foot towards cover
Hogg to Harbhajan, 1 run driven off the front foot through point for a single
Clarke to Harbhajan, no run defended towards cover once again
Clarke to Harbhajan, no run Harbhajan tries to force it on the leg side off the back foot, he gets an inside edge on to pad but it falls short of Ponting at silly point
Clarke to Harbhajan, no run padded away from outside off towards slip
Clarke to Harbhajan, no run defended on the front foot
Clarke to Harbhajan, no run Gilchrist appeals for lbw but Harbhajan was too far forward
Clarke to Harbhajan, no run Harbhajan moves back and defends to see India through to tea
Lee to Tendulkar, FOUR runs Tendulkar shows his intent immediately after tea, the ball keeping quite low, straight and he moves back to take it off the legs and clip through midwicket
Lee to Tendulkar, no run rocks on to his back foot this time to defend stoutly
Lee to Tendulkar, 1 run a hint of curl away from the right hander, pitched up there, but Tendulkar leans in with a firm shot through the covers
Lee to Harbhajan, 1 run a touch of reverse swing, yorker which curves in on the toes and Harbhajan digs the bat down at the last second
Lee to Tendulkar, FOUR runs outside off stump, a streaky edge as Tendulkar drives away from his body, pushing a would-be square drive through the vacant slips area (only one slip in)
Lee to Tendulkar, 2 runs excellent bowling, this one squaring him up and forcing a thick edge which skews just wide of the man in at first slip. Tendulkar lucky, there, Clark had beaten him
Johnson to Harbhajan, FOUR runs pitched outside off and that's belted through the covers, just leant into it and firecrackered it square, in front of point
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run Johnson responds with a straight one which pitches in front of off at thigh height, Harbhajan defends stoutly
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run dipping full toss on off, but gets away with it as Harbhajan steers to the covers
Johnson to Harbhajan, FOUR runs round the wicket..to no avail as Harbhajan flicks casually but firmly in front of midwicket to bring up his third Test fifty, his first against Australia
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run lets a good-length delivery through on the off-side
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run reaches out to push into the covers
Lee to Tendulkar, no run sooper creekit, the ball not that bad a length, pelted to Clarke in the covers, who does a screamer of a stop
Lee to Tendulkar, 1 run pushed on the front foot this time
Lee to Harbhajan, FOUR runs got away with a heavy slash off the back foot which races away over the top of the slips, the ball nipping away from him outside off
Lee to Harbhajan, 1 run a swinging yorker is dug out on the front foot towards midwicket
Lee to Tendulkar, 1 run pushed forward for an easy single
Lee to Harbhajan, no run a bit of a swing at that one
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run round the wicket, angled in at the right hander and nips off the seam also
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run too much angle this time, the ball veering down leg, the batsman gamely chasing after it
Johnson to Tendulkar, FOUR runs shorter delivery, rising, firmly cut hard over the slips cordon and on its merry way
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run left alone outside off
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run pushed from a crouching position into the covers
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run outside off, the batsman comes over to meet it and drives to the covers
Lee to Harbhajan, 1 run touch of room outside off, cut behind point and a wild throw from Ben Rohrer, the sub fieldsman, allows them to come back for the single and for Harbhajan to get off strike
Lee to Tendulkar, no run left alone through this time
Lee to Tendulkar, 1 run angled his bat and ran it down to the fine leg
Lee to Harbhajan, no run pushed into the covers on the front foot this time
Lee to Harbhajan, no run attacking bouncer, following him back as he crouches away, the ball flying over the sticks
Lee to Harbhajan, no run rushed out of the middle of the bat, but well picked up in the covers
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run outside off, cut hard to gully
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run left alone down the off-side
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run pushed down off the hips into midwicket
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 run defended on the front foot
Johnson to Harbhajan, 1 leg bye swept well off the midriff through the 45
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run more defence
Hogg to Harbhajan, 1 run nipped back in from outside off, with some rise too, played back down off the back foot
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run turned in to the right hander, and played back down round behind him
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run comes out and leans right over in defence, the bat making an angle of about 30 or 40 degrees from the floor
Hogg to Tendulkar, 1 run pushed to the covers, very well taken single
Hogg to Harbhajan, no run rocks on to his back foot to defend down
Hogg to Harbhajan, FOUR runs Harbhajan dashes India into the lead with a flashing cover drive, loved that one
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 run outside off, pushed into the covers for a comfortable single
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run short, cut hard off the back foot to gully, well fielded there
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run round the wicket, by the way, nipped back in off the seam
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run turned off the hips down into short midwicket
Johnson to Harbhajan, 1 run turned well off the toes this time to fine leg
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run over the wicket now, pushed across the right hander who elects to leave
Hogg to Harbhajan, 1 run down on one knee, swept round to the 45
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run defends this one
Hogg to Tendulkar, 2 runs hooks away quite easily towards midwicket
Hogg to Tendulkar, FOUR runs just short of being a six, Tendulkar steps down and launches an aerial drive over long-on
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run full toss, Tendulkar strides forward and lashes it to midwicket
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run comes forward and defends this time
Johnson to Singh, 1 run off the mark with a drive to the covers
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 run played off the hips to midwicket
Johnson to Singh, no run lets a good-length delivery through
Johnson to Singh, FOUR runs squared him up on the back foot and with little foot movement he fends an outside edge through the slips region
Johnson to Singh, no run pushed across the right hander who leaves that one well alone
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run pushed away from the body
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run and again
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run worked into the leg side
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run defended well off the back foot, down in front of him
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run left alone this time
Hogg to Tendulkar, 1 run steals the strike, which will be a relief, RP Singh not looking a quarter as confident as Harbhajan had been
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run defended on the front foot
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run pushes across the right hander, who is content to leave
Johnson to Tendulkar, 2 runs great running between the wickets for a two into the midwicket region
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 run pushed across the right hander who drives towards the covers
Johnson to Singh, no run pushed off the back foot into the covers
Johnson to Singh, no run left alone through to the keeper
Hogg to Tendulkar, 1 run good flight, nipping back in and Tendulkar works it into short midwicket
Hogg to Singh, no run driven carefully to mid-off
Hogg to Singh, no run good delivery, beating the outside edge, moving away from the right hander
Hogg to Singh, FOUR runs not afraid to loft the spinner, one step down and swatting it from outside off to over long-on
Hogg to Singh, no run defended on the front foot
Hogg to Singh, 1 leg bye well bowled, tangling up the batsman who works it towards square off the pads
Johnson to Singh, no run pitches short and angles a long way across RP Singh who lets the ball go through to Gilchrist
Johnson to Singh, no run Johnson gets closer to off stump, RP Singh gets behind the line and defends on the back foot
Johnson to Singh, no run RP has a wild pull at a short ball and gets completely beaten
Johnson to Singh, 3 runs take that! RP meets a full ball with a perfectly straight bat and drives past the bowler for three, what a shot to play after a rash pull
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run defended watchfully off the back foot towards the off side
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run pitches wide outside off stump from over the wicket, Tendulkar moves forward and shoulders arms
Hogg to Singh, no run tossed up outside the off stump, RP leans forward and blocks
Hogg to Singh, no run that was the wrong one and RP didn't pick it, it pitched on off and spun past the outside edge of the forward defence
Hogg to Singh, 1 run driven off the front foot towards long-on

Hogg to Tendulkar, FOUR runs that's fantastic, Tendulkar gets down on one knee and sweeps powerfully from wide outside off stump and places it in the gap on the square leg boundary, he hit that with the turn
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run defended on the front foot, that was solid
Hogg to Tendulkar, 1 run Hogg drifts on to middle and leg, Tendulkar turns it off his pads for a single to take India to 499
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run pitches outside off stump and slants further away from the right-hander, left alone by Tendulkar
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run short of a length outside off stump, Tendulkar gets on top of the bounce on the back foot and cuts towards point
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 run that's too wide once again, Tendulkar reaches out for it and cuts towards third man to bring up the 500
Johnson to Singh, no run full ball outside off stump, RP drives at it but gets beaten
Johnson to Singh, no run RP moves on to the back foot and defends confidently off the back foot towards cover
Johnson to Singh, no run Johnson pitches on middle and off but RP moves back and defends once again
Clark to Tendulkar, no run slower ball on off and middle stump, defended on the front foot
Clark to Tendulkar, 1 run Tendulkar moves towards the off side and flicks a good length ball from middle towards square leg

Clark to Singh, OUT Clark picks up his first wicket! He pitched it on a good length outside off and angled it into the right-hander, RP drove away from his body and the thick outside edge flew towards Gilchrist who took a comfortable catch
Clark to Sharma, no run he's kept the first one out, it was a full toss and Ishant played it towards midwicket, Clark was looking for the yorker
Clark to Sharma, no run good length delivery outside off stump, Ishant begins to play at it and misses outside off stump
Clark to Sharma, no run another one in the blockhole, Ishant keeps it out to give the strike back to Tendulkar
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run short ball outside the off stump, Tendulkar cuts but mis-times it
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 run Tendulkar flicks the ball off his hips and takes the single, he isn't farming the strike then, Ishant has four balls to face
Johnson to Sharma, no run left alone outside the off stump, Johnson needs to make Ishant play
Johnson to Sharma, no run another one is wide outside off stump, Ishant comfortably lets it go
Johnson to Sharma, no run pitches short and wide outside off stump, what is Johnson thinking? Ishant lets it go again
Johnson to Sharma, no run the fuller ball which is angled into the stumps finds the outside edge of Ishant's bat as he gets squared up in defence, the edge doesn't carry to Hayden at first slip
Clark to Tendulkar, 1 run full ball on off and middle stump, Tendulkar drives down the ground and takes the single once again
Clark to Sharma, 1 run he's made me take that back, Ishant fends a short-of-a-length ball off his hips behind square leg to get off the mark
Clark to Tendulkar, no run Tendulkar flicks off his pads towards midwicket
Clark to Tendulkar, no run good length delivery on off stump, Tendulkar moves across and nudges the ball towards the leg side
Clark to Tendulkar, 1 run he moves across towards the off side and flicks the ball to the right of the fielder at midwicket for a single
Clark to Sharma, no run he pitches it short and angles the ball down leg side, back to Tendulkar now
Lee to Tendulkar, 1 run he brings up 150 by steering Lee through point for a single, he gets another standing ovation from the SCG
Lee to Sharma, FOUR runs no he isn't, it's a length ball outside off stump, Ishant lofts it uppishly but he clears mid-off and the ball rolls to the boundary
Lee to Sharma, FOUR runs this time Lee looks for the yorker but over-pitches it, Ishant gets on to the front foot and drives past Symonds at mid-off for four, he takes everyone by surprise
Lee to Sharma, no run full ball in the blockhole but the line is outside off stump
Lee to Sharma, no run another full delivery on middle stump, Ishant pushes the ball towards cover
Lee to Sharma, no run Ishant gets on to the back foot and defends with a straight bat, loud cheers from the Indian fans at the SCG
Clark to Tendulkar, no run defended towards to mid-on
Clark to Tendulkar, no run Clark bowls a short ball which Tendulkar ducks under
Clark to Tendulkar, 1 run low full toss on middle stump, Tendulkar flicks behind square for a single
Clark to Sharma, no run Clark tests Ishant with a short ball, he sways awkwardly out of the way
Clark to Sharma, no run another short ball outside off stump, Ishant lets it go again, is Clark setting him up for the yorker off the last ball?
Clark to Sharma, no run no, it's another short ball which Ishant defends towards the vacant short leg region, why doesn't Ponting have a man catching there?
Lee to Tendulkar, 1 run Tendulkar flicks the ball towards midwicket and sets off for two, he has to settle for one because the fielder in the deep covered ground quickly to get to the ball
Lee to Sharma, no run defended on the back foot towards point

Lee to Sharma, FOUR runs how about that? Ishant stands on the back foot and opens the face of the bat to run the ball past the slip cordon, he wasn't in complete control but he did his bit to keep the ball down
Lee to Sharma, no run defended once again towards gully off the back foot
Lee to Sharma, FOUR runs and another one runs down to third man, Sharma drives off the front foot but gets the outside edge once again, Lee can't believe it
Lee to Sharma, no run Ishant begins to feel at a short of a length ball outside off but pulls his bat out of the way in time
Clark to Tendulkar, 1 run the yorker on off stump, Tendulkar pushes it off the front foot towards cover and takes the single
Clark to Sharma, no run defended watchfully off the back foot to the off side
Clark to Sharma, no run Clark bangs it in short down leg side, Ishant fends at it but gets beaten
Clark to Sharma, FOUR runs another short ball on leg stump, there's a short leg and a leg gully but Ishant somehow manages to pull it away in the gap to the fine leg boundary
Clark to Sharma, no run now he does splendidly to dig the yorker out to the fielder at short leg
Clark to Sharma, 2 runs the length is full and the line is on middle and leg, Ishant flicks confidently towards the vacant space at deep square leg, Lee runs around from long leg to field
Lee to Tendulkar, 1 run Tendulkar defends a good length ball towards the off side and takes the single off the first ball once again, well the ploy has paid off so far so you can't really complain
Lee to Sharma, no run Ishant plays an ambitious drive off the front foot at a good length ball outside off stump, he misses
Lee to Sharma, no run beaten outside the off stump
Lee to Sharma, no run Ishant drives a full ball angling into off stump, he's hit that firmly towards mid-off
Lee to Sharma, no run good length ball on middle stump, Ishant jumps on to the back foot and defends with a straight bat
Lee to Sharma, no run left alone outside the off stump, Ishant hands the strike back to Tendulkar, you get the feeling that Ishant will get it back soon enough
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run Tendulkar leans forward to a tossed up delivery and pushes it to midwicket
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run defended watchfully off the front foot
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run Tendulkar stretches forward once again and blocks
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run full delivery on off and middle stump, Tendulkar pushes the ball to long-on and, yes, he does refuse the single
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run Tendulkar doesn't read the wrong one and gets hit on the pad while trying to defend on the front foot, lovely delivery but it was missing off
Hogg to Tendulkar, no run the quicker one to end the over, Tendulkar tries to paddle sweep but misses, he's a little upset with himself
Lee to Sharma, no run Ishant gets behind the line of a short ball, takes the bottom hand off the bat, and defends to the off side

Lee to Sharma, OUT Lee gets his fifth! He bowls another short ball right at Ishant's body, he fends at it with the bat well in front of the body, the ball hits the face of the bat and lobs up towards Lee who takes a comfortable catch
If you're not going to be at your computer for the final 30 minutes of play, you can still get Cricinfo's commentary on your mobile phone by clicking here.

5.32 pm local time Ishant's done a splendid job, scoring 23 out of the last-wicket stand of 31. Tendulkar walks off the field to loud cheers once again, he remains undefeated on 154. Could he have shielded the tail better? Well the last three wickets added 1
Innings Start

The players have just finished with drinks. Australia have picked up two wickets and are employing plenty of close in catchers because they have the luxury of a large target to defend. They are in with a definite chance to win this.
